## mergeMap variable

Merges all given maps in left-to-right order into `dest`<!-- -->. Returns `dest`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mergeMap: <K, V>(dest: Map<K, V>, ...xs: Map<K, V>[]) => Map<K, V>
```
